boardgame.name: Star Wars: Armada
boardgame.description: Massive Star Destroyers fly to battle against Rebel corvettes and frigates. Banks of turbolasers unleash torrential volleys of fire against squadrons of X-wing and TIEs. Engineering teams race to route additional power to failing shields. Laser blasts and explosions flare across the battlefield. Even a single ship can change the tide of battle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Star Wars: Armada, you assume the role of fleet admiral, serving with either the Imperial Navy or Rebel Alliance. You assemble your fleet and engage the enemy. Using the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s unique maneuver tool, you steer your capital ships across the battlefield, even while squadrons of starfighters buzz around them. Then, as these ships exchange fire, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s your job to issue the tactical commands that will decide the course of battle and, perhaps, the fate of the galaxy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Maneuver Tool_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The maneuver tool is one of the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s most innovative features and adds a unique feel to the way your capital ships must accommodate for inertia as they maneuver through the stars._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It consists of a number of segments linked with hinges, which is used to plot the ship's course. More nimble ships are allowed to turn the ship further at each hinge._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Command Stack_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Armada balances the awesome scale of the Star Wars galaxy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s ships and space warfare with intuitive ship designs and accessible rules for issuing commands and resolving combat that make for rich, engaging, and highly tactical play experiences._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Capital ships are extremely powerful war machines, but they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re also massive and sophisticated vessels that can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t swiftly react to every development in the heat of battle. Accordingly, the key to flying these vessels effectively is learning how to plan ahead. You want to issue your commands in such a way that your crews will be ready to execute them at just the right times._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each of your pre-painted capital ships has a command value, which determines how many commands it will have in its stack at any given point in time. During setup, you secretly build your initial command stack, selecting from any of four different commands, each of which provides a different advantage. Once you have locked your selections, you place the commands in your stack in the order of your choice. Then, during each round of game play, you secretly select and assign a new command to your ship, placing it at the bottom of your command stack, before you reveal the command at the top of your stack and gain its benefits._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: This is a PRE ORDER for a brand new copy of Star Wars: Armada. The expected date is unclear at the moment - it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s scheduled for Q1 2015, and looks like it should be mid-March... as soon as I have an update I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll post here and also notify everybody that has pre-ordered. To pre-order you can either _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;buy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; it here on the marketplace or just send me a PM on boardgamegeek. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll need to know your delivery address, how you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to pay (PayPal or bank transfer) and your email address. Once our stock is confirmed and on it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s way to our warehouse I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll then get in touch re payment and then ship the game out to you as quickly as possible. In the event that stocks are limited then the earliest placed orders will be honored first, anybody too late in the queue will be notified as soon as possible and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll try to help out with some alternative options (e.g. if we have an ETA for a second wave of stock). Happy shopping! Christian UK standard shipping (3-5 days) is £6 UK express shipping (1-2 days) is £9 EU shipping is £29 The rest of Europe and further afield may be possible - just give me a shout and I can look up prices for you.

New, sealed and not boring. Shipping for lower 48 states: Free shipping on orders over $100 $11 for UPS SurePost(1-2 days longer than Ground) $15 for UPS Ground(1-5 business days) For shipping outside lower 48 states, contact for quote. Have questions? I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d love to talk to you. Paypal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Contact: daniel@notboredboardgames.com Standard Policies: -Texans: 8.25% sales tax if shipping or local pickup. -PayPal policy states I must ship to address attached to your PayPal account. Make sure it is up to date. -Most orders ship within 24 hours of receiving payment on business days. -Returns accepted within 30 days. Must be unopened _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; undamaged. You must finance return shipping. -If item is damaged, contact me for resolution.

This listing includes: 1x Core Set 1x Dice Pack 1x Rebel Fighters Pack 1x Imperial Fighters Pack 1x Nebulon-B Expansion 1x Gladiator Class Star Destroyer 1x Assault Frigate Mark II These figures have been assembled and only played with once, so are like new. Shipping will be completely covered by the buyer (shipping from Burbank, CA will). Shipping will likely range from $7-$9 for California and as high as $15-$17 for cross country. All materials will be carefully packaged in the core box or will arrange for local pickup. Paypal Only. Feel free to send any questions.
Most cards sleeved, sleeves provided. Large Tarot-sized cards all sleeved. Game is 80% un-punched. Never played. 17$ shipping.

It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s been played twice. It includes the following expansion packs: Victory class Star Destroyer; Nebulon-B Frigate; Gladiator-class Star Destroyer; CR90 Corellian Corvette; Assault Frigate Mark II; Imperial Fighters Squadron Expansion Pack; and Rebel Fighters Squadrons Expansion Pack. I just couldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t control myself even though I knew it wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t a game I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d manage to get to the table after the first few plays. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got a couple of extra Tie Fighters and X-Wings (individual ships) as well.
Core Set. Shipping will be $15.80 through USPS flat rate anywhere in the US
For Shriner only Gencon pick up

Includes starter kit, one each of the expansion packs of the starter kit models (Star Destroyer, Frigate and Corvette), 2x Gladiator frigates, Imperial fighters expansion, Rebel fighters expansion. Bought new, only played twice, and kept in smoke and pet-free home. Also includes Imperial Assault, lightly played, kept in a pet and smoke-free home at all times. Also includes Mage Knight base game, Krang character expansion and Lost Legions expansion. Bought new, lightly played, and cards were sleeved. All components combined into one box. I will provide free economy shipping.

This copy comes with two of the Rebel Corvette models rather than just one, this is because the original one shipped with the game to me was slightly bent so I got a replacement sent out from FFG. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll put both of them in the box. The only other thing worth mentioning is that the vertical aerial on the Star Destroyer seems to be a little shorter than other ones that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve seen. I honestly don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know if a small piece has broken off it or if it was a manufacturing error, but either way it in no way affects the set. Will only ship within the UK.
Base set plus the following: 1 x Dice Set 1 x Everything in Wave 1 Ships have their blisters still. Shipping to be paid by buyer.

Condition is excellent on cards and components. One fighter and the Star Destroyer had a couple broken pieces and the antenna on the Destroyer had some problems on delivery that I fixed with super glue. A little is visible on the Star Destroyer but the Tie is unnoticeable. The buyer pays for the shipping.

In shrink wrap brand new. Picked it up for $50 on super sale but just don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have anyone to play it with and plenty of other great 2 player games and folks who will play some of those with me. No sense even opening it, so no sense in keeping it. Price is $50 + shipping. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll probably use Fed Ex because I have a business account there so it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s almost always the cheapest option. I promise to package it very well and ship it to you as quickly as I can. Pay by PayPal or, preferably but not likely since I bet you haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t even heard of it, Dwolla.

This listing includes two of every ship released in Wave 1 (counting the ships from the core set), plus a third CR90, two sets of Rebel and Imperial fighters, and an extra set of dice. Everything is organized in the printable squadron hangar boxes from the Armada files section here on BGG. All fighters have been highlighted with permanent marker, as shown in the photos attached to the listing. Items are from a smoke-free home with a hypoallergenic dog who doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t play with the games. Specific items in this listing are 1x [thing=163745][/thing] (the main listing) 1x [thing=168927][/thing] 1x [thing=169018][/thing] 1x [thing=169020][/thing] 1x [thing=169017][/thing] 1x [thing=168929][/thing] 2x [thing=168928][/thing] 1x [thing=169019][/thing] 1x [thing=169033][/thing] Fighters are stored, and will ship, in a spare Dominion box. While I normally ship USPS Priority, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to investigate UPS or FedEx on request. I put insurance on the shipping order for a large item like this unless requested otherwise.
For Awilduser only.

Star Wars Armada Dice Pack ONLY. Free shipping. I am selling my Armada Collection. Include is: 1 Starter Set (1x Star Destroyer, 1x Corvette, 1x Nebulon-B, 4x X-wings, 6x TIE Fighters) 2 Gladiator Expansions 1 Victory Class Star Destroyer Expansion 2 Corvette Expansions 1 Nebulon-B Expansion 1 Assault Frigate Mk II 1 Rebel Fighter Expansion 1 Empire Fighter Expansion (1 TIE and 1 X-wing painted. Most bases are spray painted black.) All cards and tokens are included. This game has been punched and played once. All pieces are bagged and included within. All ships have been assembled and are on their bases. If you are interested, I will also include the Rebel Fighter Squadrons and Imperial Fighter Squadrons for and extra $20 for both or $10 dollars each.
This is a fine game, I just have other interests and do not want to keep up with Armada. I would rather put my money into Ares games WWI Wings of War which I prefer more. As I have heard some people say they do not agree with FFG_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s development and marketing decisions. I agree and this have divested myself of many of their games. I will keep the games that they made before they went solely horror or movie licensing games. I will keep Rebellion though. I will ship in USA using USPS from zip code of 14216. I will send it as cheaply as possible. Do not ask for a shipping estimate. I am not making two trips to the Post Office. Once you place your order I will get the shipping estimate and send it to you. I will send it elsewhere in the world, but do not expect the shipping to be cheap. In my experience sending things to the Pacific (Asia) seems to be more expensive than Europe. Note: If you make an order and do not pay me and then fail to contact me as to why you have not paid me, I will give you a negative rating. I am taking the time to go to the post office and get you an estimate. I am sending the game as cheaply as possible. Please be an honest buyer.
includes the rebels and allies expansion.
